text: tannalute kaikal munkutticeytu veccatinre phalamayi avarkku valla vipattum neritukayum appeal nannalute raksitave, nannalute atuttekk ninakk oru dutane ayaccukutayirunnea, enkil nannal ninre telivukal pintutarukayum, nannal satyavisvasikalute kuttattilavukayum ceytene enn avar parayukayum ceyyillayirunnuvenkil (nam ninne dutanayi ayakkumayirunnilla)
